lead_paragraph: BROOK--Jonathan Edward. Dearest Jon, We miss you and love you deeply one year after losing you. Beloved husband, adoring father, caring and loving son and brother, nephew, cousin, delight of our family. Your friendship meant a lot to many, and all who knew you miss you immensely. You will always be in our hearts. Words cannot describe the depth of our loss. Nicole, Juliette, Cassie, Judith, David, Adam and so many others 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Memorials  BROOK, JONATHAN EDWARD
